Highlight -> click -> DONE
Boring and repetitive writing of emails and navigating through folders or URL libraries is now a thing of the past!
You can easily share the same information again & again with templates, or attach the most used files and clips to just one keyword. This time saver is useful whether you’re in sales, marketing or a very busy executive who’s short on time.
